attributes.action: review terrorism act to prevent police from abusing it as with lauren southern.
attributes.background: a few days ago, Canadian journalist lauren southern was detained at Calais under section 7 of the counter terrorism act. this is a profoundly disturbing abuse of said powers and needs to be opposed as the tyranny that it is. i therefore call on all conscientious people to sign this petition.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
